data.text: @CityNewsVAN Your a joke. The whole world is removing restriction. There are fight in the stores now with unmasked people. SOME people are not listening to your restriction anymore. You are going to get people hurt if you keep these silly rules in place for much longer.
@CityNewsVAN Can we look up her bank accounts just like what Trudeau did to the truckers???
@CityNewsVAN Listen to the expert Bonnie on masks…. https://t.co/872EtlLktE

@CityNewsVAN #bonniehenry  your time is over here we are no longer following your ridiculous mandates. You like to keep the fear into us so you can stay relevant and keep you Winery busy! Stop this division and end the mandates.

@CityNewsVAN In Jan. 2021, Henry had announced that a target vaccination threshold for COVID-19 herd immunity was around 70%.

Henry’s contract with B.C. pays $384,316 a year. For the year ended March 31, 2021, the province’s sunshine list shows she received $342,292 plus $9,758 expenses
@michaelstarchuk @CityNewsVAN Bonnie Himmler won’t give up control that easily.
@CityNewsVAN By now everybody has either had it or been exposed to it. Bonnie Himmler needs to realize and “follow the science.”
@CityNewsVAN Total nonsense. There is NO testing unless you happen to end up in hospital. Bit late then.
